title: Accessory & Portafilter Compatibility Guide
description: Check which Arco accessories fit your machine's portafilter size before you buy. Our guide covers 58mm and 53mm portafilter systems, including tampers, distribution tools, filter baskets, and bottomless portafilters.
hero_image_alt: An array of Arco accessories — tamper, distribution tool, filter baskets, and bottomless portafilter — arranged by size on a walnut surface

portafilter_sizes.description: Industry-standard 58mm portafilter. Compatible with the widest range of aftermarket accessories.
Compact 53mm portafilter designed for the Nano's smaller group head. Requires size-specific accessories.
The Automatico uses an internal brew unit (no portafilter). The Steam uses a proprietary pressurized holder.

accessories.name: Arco Precision Tamper 58mm
accessories.notes: Spring-loaded calibrated tamper. Ensures consistent 30lb tamp pressure. Fits all Arco 58mm machines.

accessories.name: Arco Precision Tamper 53mm
accessories.notes: Compact version for the Arco Nano. Same calibrated spring mechanism as the 58mm.

accessories.name: Arco WDT Distribution Tool
accessories.notes: 0.4mm needles break up clumps before tamping. Universal fit — works with any portafilter diameter.

accessories.name: Arco Leveling Tamper 58mm
accessories.notes: Combined distributor and tamper in one tool. Adjustable depth. Thread onto portafilter and spin to level, then tamp.

accessories.name: Arco Bottomless Portafilter 58mm
accessories.notes: Walnut-handle bottomless portafilter for diagnosing extraction. Fits all Arco 58mm group heads. Includes 18g VST-style basket.

accessories.name: Arco Bottomless Portafilter 53mm
accessories.notes: Nano-specific bottomless portafilter. Includes 16g precision basket.

accessories.name: Arco Precision Basket 14g (Single)
accessories.notes: IMS-type precision single basket for 12-15g doses. Fits all Arco 58mm portafilters.

accessories.name: Arco Precision Basket 18g (Double)
accessories.notes: The default basket for most users. Optimized for 16-20g doses. Uniform hole pattern for even extraction.

accessories.name: Arco Precision Basket 21g (Triple)
accessories.notes: Deep basket for 19-22g doses. Ideal for lighter roasts that benefit from higher doses.

accessories.name: Arco Nano Precision Basket 16g
accessories.notes: The standard basket for the Arco Nano. Optimized for 14-17g doses.

accessories.name: Arco Puck Screen 58.5mm
accessories.notes: Stainless steel mesh screen sits atop the puck. Promotes even water distribution and keeps the shower screen clean.

accessories.name: Arco Puck Screen 53.5mm
accessories.notes: Nano-sized puck screen. Same benefits as the 58mm version.

accessories.name: Arco Dosing Funnel 58mm
accessories.notes: Magnetic dosing ring prevents grounds from spilling during transfer. Anodized aluminum.

accessories.name: Arco Dosing Funnel 53mm
accessories.notes: Nano-specific dosing funnel. Same magnetic attachment system.
